cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to -1 (negative value) will cause configuration validation failure as thread count must be positive.

du.explanation_en: Setting preambleReceivedTargetPower to 100 (exceeds maximum allowed power) will cause configuration validation failure in the RACH power configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 preambleReceivedTargetPower 設定為 100（超過最大允許功率）會在 RACH 功率配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
